scripts.build: npm run build -w types && npm run build -w modules && npm run build -w bundles
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w types --if-present && npm run clean -w modules --if-present && npm run clean -w bundles --if-present
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch -w types" "npm run watch -w modules" "npm run watch -w bundles"
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w types --if-present && npm run typecheck -w modules --if-present && npm run typecheck -w bundles --if-present
